synopsis.text: Iwai's luscious, uncuttable locks have always been a curse, making her the target of a deadly game. But when Kiri Haimura, a boy with an unusual fascination for cutting hair, stumbles upon her, everything changes. Armed with his ancestral scissors, the Severing Crime Edge, Kiri becomes the only person capable of cutting Iwai's hair and setting her free from her curse. However, their newfound freedom comes at a price, as they find themselves hunted by Authors, wielders of cursed objects known as Killing Goods, who seek to kill Iwai and have their deepest desires granted. In this lethal game of fate, Kiri must protect Iwai and unravel the dark history behind his own Killing Good. Will they be able to survive the onslaught of Authors and put an end to the deadly game? Join Kiri and Iwai in their thrilling adventure to find out!
